apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a couple with a heart on Apple devices showcases two women, one with light skin tone and the other without a specified skin tone, unified by a vibrant red heart. Apple's design imbues the figures with a gentle, rounded form and the heart with a glossy sheen, suggesting a loving and harmonious relationship. The soft gradients and subtle highlights on Apple devices convey warmth and affection, making this emoji a beautiful representation of romantic partnership and love.
